data.title: 30 Facts About Wiz Khalifa
data.meta_description: Discover 30 intriguing facts about the talented rapper Wiz Khalifa, from his rise to fame, musical achievements, personal life, and more.
data.text:
Wiz Khalifa was born on September 8, 1987.

From his humble beginnings in Minot, North Dakota, to becoming a global superstar, Wiz Khalifa has captivated audiences with his unique style and infectious energy.

Wiz Khalifa’s real name is Cameron Jibril Thomaz.

Although widely known by his stage name, Wiz Khalifa, his birth name is Cameron Jibril Thomaz. He adopted the stage name “Wiz” due to his affinity for being wise beyond his years.

Wiz Khalifa’s breakthrough hit was “Black and Yellow” in 2010.

Released as the lead single from his third studio album, “Black and Yellow” became an instant anthem and catapulted Wiz Khalifa into mainstream success.

Wiz Khalifa is known for his love of marijuana.

With his distinct cannabis-inspired lyrics and lifestyle, Wiz Khalifa has become synonymous with the marijuana culture, even launching his own line of premium cannabis products called Khalifa Kush.

Wiz Khalifa has collaborated with numerous artists across various genres.

From pop stars like Charlie Puth to hip-hop icons like Snoop Dogg, Wiz Khalifa has demonstrated his versatility by collaborating with artists from different musical backgrounds.

Wiz Khalifa holds the record for the most-streamed song in a single week on Spotify.

In 2015, his hit track “See You Again” featuring Charlie Puth, which was featured in the movie “Furious 7,” broke records with over 4.2 million streams in just one week.

Wiz Khalifa is an avid Pittsburgh Steelers fan.

Being a Pittsburgh native, Wiz Khalifa is a die-hard fan of the city’s football team, the Pittsburgh Steelers, and often references them in his songs.

Wiz Khalifa’s love for fashion led to collaborations with clothing brands.

Known for his unique fashion sense, Wiz Khalifa has partnered with brands like Converse and Raw Rolling Papers, designing his own signature lines.

Wiz Khalifa is a proud father.

Wiz Khalifa has a son named Sebastian Taylor Thomaz, who he affectionately refers to as “Bash.” He often shares moments with his son on social media.

Wiz Khalifa is a Guinness World Record holder.

In 2015, Wiz Khalifa set a Guinness World Record for the most simultaneous downloads of a mobile music track with his hit single “See You Again.

Wiz Khalifa believes in the healing power of music.

He has spoken openly about the therapeutic nature of music and how it has helped him overcome personal struggles and connect with his audience on a deep level.

Wiz Khalifa is an accomplished actor.

Aside from his music career, Wiz Khalifa has also ventured into acting, appearing in films such as “Mac & Devin Go to High School” and “Gangster Squad.”

Wiz Khalifa has his own record label called Taylor Gang Entertainment.

Founded in 2006, Taylor Gang Entertainment serves as a platform for Wiz Khalifa to promote and support emerging artists.

Wiz Khalifa has a strong social media presence.

With millions of followers on platforms like Instagram and Twitter, Wiz Khalifa uses his social media accounts to connect with fans and share updates on his music and lifestyle.

Wiz Khalifa is an advocate for marijuana legalization.

He actively supports the decriminalization and legalization of marijuana and believes in its medicinal benefits.

Wiz Khalifa has won numerous awards throughout his career.

From Teen Choice Awards to Billboard Music Awards, Wiz Khalifa has been recognized for his talent and contributions to the music industry.

Wiz Khalifa has a passion for cars.

He has a notable collection of luxury and vintage cars, including a yellow 1962 Chevrolet Impala, which holds a special place in his heart.

Wiz Khalifa has a close friendship with fellow rapper, Snoop Dogg.

Both known for their love of marijuana, Wiz Khalifa and Snoop Dogg have collaborated on several projects and often refer to each other as “uncle” and “nephew.

Wiz Khalifa is known for his high-energy live performances.

His stage presence and ability to engage the crowd have made him a sought-after performer at music festivals and concerts worldwide.

Wiz Khalifa embraces a healthy lifestyle.

He follows a vegetarian diet and regularly engages in physical activities like skateboarding and MMA training to maintain his fitness.

Wiz Khalifa released a mobile app called “Weed Farm.”

In an interesting entrepreneurial move, Wiz Khalifa launched a mobile game where players can run their own virtual marijuana farm.

Wiz Khalifa has his own line of rolling papers.

Reflecting his love for smoking, Wiz Khalifa collaborated with Raw Rolling Papers to create his own line of branded rolling papers.

Wiz Khalifa is a philanthropist.

He has been involved in various charitable endeavors, including supporting projects aimed at providing clean water to developing countries and assisting underprivileged youth.

Wiz Khalifa’s iconic laugh has become his trademark.

Known for his infectious laughter, Wiz Khalifa’s distinctive chuckle has been featured in his songs and is instantly recognizable to his fans.

Wiz Khalifa is an advocate for mental health awareness.

He has spoken openly about his struggles with anxiety and depression, using his platform to encourage others to seek help and take care of their mental well-being.

Wiz Khalifa has collaborated with iconic fashion brands.

He has worked with brands like BAPE, Diamond Supply Co., and Supreme, showcasing his influence in the fashion industry.

Wiz Khalifa is a sports enthusiast.

Aside from football, he also enjoys basketball and is a fan of the NBA, often attending games and supporting his favorite teams.

Wiz Khalifa’s music has inspired countless artists.

His unique blend of rap and melodic hooks has influenced a new generation of musicians and has helped shape the modern hip-hop landscape.

Wiz Khalifa’s album “Rolling Papers” debuted at number two on the Billboard 200 chart.

Released in 2011, “Rolling Papers” showcased Wiz Khalifa’s growth as an artist and solidified his position in the music industry.

Wiz Khalifa is known for his positive and uplifting lyrics.

Through his music, Wiz Khalifa often spreads messages of self-reflection, hope, and perseverance, resonating with fans worldwide.

Conclusion

In conclusion, Wiz Khalifa is not just a talented rapper, but also a multifaceted individual with a fascinating background and a slew of achievements under his belt. From his early mixtapes to his chart-topping hits, Wiz Khalifa has made a significant impact on the music industry. His unique style, lyricism, and ability to connect with his audience have solidified his position as one of the most influential figures in hip-hop.Aside from his music, Wiz Khalifa has also made waves in the world of fashion, film, and activism. His distinct fashion sense has garnered attention, and he has collaborated with various brands to create iconic looks. Furthermore, his passion for cannabis activism has led him to launch his own strain and lifestyle brand, further solidifying his influence beyond just music.All in all, Wiz Khalifa’s journey from a passionate young artist to a global sensation is filled with dedication, perseverance, and a genuine love for his craft. As he continues to evolve as an artist and explore new avenues, there is no doubt that he will leave a lasting legacy in the world of entertainment.

FAQs

1. When was Wiz Khalifa born?

Wiz Khalifa was born on September 8, 1987.

2. What is Wiz Khalifa’s real name?

Wiz Khalifa’s real name is Cameron Jibril Thomaz.

3. How did Wiz Khalifa get into music?

Wiz Khalifa developed an interest in music at a young age and began recording mixtapes in his teenage years. He gained recognition for his music and eventually signed with a record label.

4. What are some of Wiz Khalifa’s most popular songs?

Some of Wiz Khalifa’s most popular songs include “See You Again,” “Black and Yellow,” “We Dem Boyz,” and “Roll Up.”

5. Has Wiz Khalifa won any awards?

Yes, Wiz Khalifa has won several awards, including a Billboard Music Award, a BET Award, and multiple Teen Choice Awards.

6. Is Wiz Khalifa involved in any other ventures besides music?

Yes, Wiz Khalifa is involved in various ventures besides music. He has a clothing line, has appeared in movies, and is a prominent figure in the cannabis industry.

7. Does Wiz Khalifa have any collaborations with other artists?

Yes, Wiz Khalifa has collaborated with numerous artists, including Charlie Puth, Snoop Dogg, Ty Dolla Sign, and Lil Wayne.

8. How would you describe Wiz Khalifa’s musical style?

Wiz Khalifa’s musical style can be described as a unique blend of hip-hop, rap, and R&B. He often incorporates catchy hooks, melodic flows, and introspective lyrics into his songs.

9. Has Wiz Khalifa been involved in any charitable work?

Yes, Wiz Khalifa has been involved in various charitable endeavors. He has supported organizations such as the Taylor Allderdice High School and has participated in benefit concerts for causes close to his heart.

10. What can we expect from Wiz Khalifa in the future?

We can expect Wiz Khalifa to continue pushing boundaries in music and expanding his influence in other industries. He is known for his innovation and versatility, so there is no telling what exciting projects he will embark on next.
